001package io.github.ai4ci.functions;
002
003import java.io.Serializable;
004
005import org.immutables.value.Value;
006
007import com.fasterxml.jackson.annotation.JsonIgnore;
008import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.annotation.JsonDeserialize;
009import com.fasterxml.jackson.databind.annotation.JsonSerialize;
010
011import io.github.ai4ci.util.Sampler;
012
013/**
014 * Specify distributions and parameters in a way that makes configuring them in
015 * a JSON file is relatively straightforward. All distributions defined by a
016 * central and dispersion parameter which in most cases will be Mean and SD.
017 */
018
019public interface SimpleDistribution extends Distribution, Serializable {
020
021        /**
022         * Configuration for a Beta Distribution.
023         */
024        @Value.Immutable
025        @JsonSerialize(as = ImmutableBetaDistribution.class)
026        @JsonDeserialize(as = ImmutableBetaDistribution.class)
027        public static interface BetaDistribution
028                        extends SimpleDistribution, FromMoments {
029
030                @Override @Value.Default @JsonIgnore
031                default LinkFunction getLink() { return LinkFunction.LOGIT; }
032
033                @Override
034                double getMean();
035
036                @Override
037                double getSd();
038
039                @Override
040                default double sample(Sampler s) {
041                        return s.beta(this.getMean(), this.getSd(), false);
042                }
043        }
044
045        /**
046         * Configuration for a Binomial Distribution.
047         */
048        @Value.Immutable
049        @JsonSerialize(as = ImmutableBinomialDistribution.class)
050        @JsonDeserialize(as = ImmutableBinomialDistribution.class)
051        public static interface BinomialDistribution
052                        extends SimpleDistribution, FromMoments {
053
054                @Override @Value.Default @JsonIgnore
055                default LinkFunction getLink() { return LinkFunction.LOGIT; }
056
057                @Override
058                double getMean();
059
060                @Override
061                double getSd();
062
063                @Override
064                default double sample(Sampler s) {
065                        return s.binom(this.getMean(), this.getSd());
066                }
067        }
068
069        /**
070         * Interface for distributions that can be parameterized by their mean and
071         * standard deviation.
072         */
073        public static interface FromMoments {
074
075                /**
076                 * The expected value of the distribution.
077                 *
078                 * @return the expected value
079                 */
080                double getMean();
081                /**
082                 * The standard deviation of the distribution.
083                 *
084                 * @return the standard deviation
085                 */
086                double getSd();
087        }
088
089        /**
090         * Configuration for a Gamma Distribution.
091         */
092        @Value.Immutable
093        @JsonSerialize(as = ImmutableGammaDistribution.class)
094        @JsonDeserialize(as = ImmutableGammaDistribution.class)
095        public static interface GammaDistribution
096                        extends SimpleDistribution, FromMoments {
097
098                @Override @Value.Default @JsonIgnore
099                default LinkFunction getLink() { return LinkFunction.LOG; }
100
101                @Override
102                double getMean();
103
104                @Override
105                double getSd();
106
107                @Override
108                default double sample(Sampler s) {
109                        return s.gamma(this.getMean(), this.getSd());
110                }
111        }
112
113        /**
114         * Configuration for a Logit-Normal Distribution.
115         */
116        @Value.Immutable
117        @JsonSerialize(as = ImmutableLogitNormalDistribution.class)
118        @JsonDeserialize(as = ImmutableLogitNormalDistribution.class)
119        public static interface LogitNormalDistribution extends SimpleDistribution {
120
121                @Override @Value.Default @JsonIgnore
122                default LinkFunction getLink() { return LinkFunction.LOGIT; }
123
124                /**
125                 * The median of the distribution
126                 *
127                 * @return the median of the distribution
128                 */
129                double getMedian();
130
131                /**
132                 * The scale parameter of the distribution, which controls the spread of
133                 * the distribution around the median.
134                 *
135                 * @return the scale parameter
136                 */
137                double getScale();
138
139                @Override
140                default double sample(Sampler s) {
141                        return s.logitNormal(this.getMedian(), this.getScale());
142                }
143        }
144
145        /**
146         * Configuration for a Log-Normal Distribution.
147         */
148        @Value.Immutable
149        @JsonSerialize(as = ImmutableLogNormalDistribution.class)
150        @JsonDeserialize(as = ImmutableLogNormalDistribution.class)
151        public static interface LogNormalDistribution
152                        extends SimpleDistribution, FromMoments {
153
154                @Override @Value.Default @JsonIgnore
155                default LinkFunction getLink() { return LinkFunction.LOG; }
156
157                @Override
158                double getMean();
159
160                @Override
161                double getSd();
162
163                @Override
164                default double sample(Sampler s) {
165                        return s.logNormal(this.getMean(), this.getSd());
166                }
167        }
168
169        /**
170         * Configuration for a Negative Binomial Distribution.
171         */
172        @Value.Immutable
173        @JsonSerialize(as = ImmutableNegBinomialDistribution.class)
174        @JsonDeserialize(as = ImmutableNegBinomialDistribution.class)
175        public static interface NegBinomialDistribution
176                        extends SimpleDistribution, FromMoments {
177
178                @Override @Value.Default @JsonIgnore
179                default LinkFunction getLink() { return LinkFunction.LOG; }
180
181                @Override
182                double getMean();
183
184                @Override
185                double getSd();
186
187                @Override
188                default double sample(Sampler s) {
189                        return s.negBinom(this.getMean(), this.getSd());
190                }
191        }
192
193        /**
194         * Configuration for a Normal Distribution.
195         */
196        @Value.Immutable
197        @JsonSerialize(as = ImmutableNormalDistribution.class)
198        @JsonDeserialize(as = ImmutableNormalDistribution.class)
199        public static interface NormalDistribution
200                        extends SimpleDistribution, FromMoments {
201
202                @Override @Value.Default @JsonIgnore
203                default LinkFunction getLink() { return LinkFunction.NONE; }
204
205                @Override
206                double getMean();
207
208                @Override
209                double getSd();
210
211                @Override
212                default double sample(Sampler s) {
213                        return s.normal(this.getMean(), this.getSd());
214                }
215        }
216
217        /**
218         * Configuration for a Point Distribution, which always returns the same
219         * value.
220         */
221        @Value.Immutable
222        @JsonSerialize(as = ImmutablePointDistribution.class)
223        @JsonDeserialize(as = ImmutablePointDistribution.class)
224        public static interface PointDistribution extends SimpleDistribution {
225
226                @Override @Value.Default @JsonIgnore
227                default LinkFunction getLink() { return LinkFunction.NONE; }
228
229                /**
230                 * The single value of the distribution.
231                 *
232                 * @return the value of the distribution
233                 */
234                double getMean();
235
236                @Override
237                default double sample(Sampler s) {
238                        return this.getMean();
239                }
240        }
241
242        /**
243         * Configuration for a Poisson Distribution.
244         */
245        @Value.Immutable
246        @JsonSerialize(as = ImmutablePoissonDistribution.class)
247        @JsonDeserialize(as = ImmutablePoissonDistribution.class)
248        public static interface PoissonDistribution extends SimpleDistribution {
249
250                @Override @Value.Default @JsonIgnore
251                default LinkFunction getLink() { return LinkFunction.LOG; }
252
253                /**
254                 * The expected value of the distribution, which is also the variance.
255                 *
256                 * @return the expected value
257                 */
258                double getMean();
259
260                @Override
261                default double sample(Sampler s) {
262                        return s.poisson(this.getMean());
263                }
264        }
265
266        /**
267         * Configuration for a Uniform Distribution.
268         */
269        @Value.Immutable
270        @JsonSerialize(as = ImmutableUniformDistribution.class)
271        @JsonDeserialize(as = ImmutableUniformDistribution.class)
272        public static interface UniformDistribution extends SimpleDistribution {
273
274                @Override @Value.Default @JsonIgnore
275                default LinkFunction getLink() { return LinkFunction.NONE; }
276
277                /**
278                 * The maximum value of the distribution.
279                 *
280                 * @return the maximum value
281                 */
282                @Value.Default
283
284                default double getMax() { return 1; }
285
286                @Override
287                default double getMaxSupport() { return this.getMax(); }
288
289                /**
290                 * The mean of the distribution, which is the midpoint between the minimum
291                 * and maximum values.
292                 *
293                 * @return the mean value
294                 */
295                @Value.Default @JsonIgnore
296                default double getMean() {
297                        return (this.getMax() - this.getMin()) / 2.0 + this.getMin();
298                }
299
300                /**
301                 * The minimum value of the distribution.
302                 *
303                 * @return the minimum value
304                 */
305                @Value.Default
306                default double getMin() { return 0; }
307
308                @Override
309                default double getMinSupport() { return this.getMin(); }
310
311                @Override
312                default double sample(Sampler s) {
313                        return s.uniform(this.getMin(), this.getMax());
314                }
315        }
316
317        /**
318         * Configuration for a Unimodal Beta Distribution
319         */
320        @Value.Immutable
321        @JsonSerialize(as = ImmutableUnimodalBetaDistribution.class)
322        @JsonDeserialize(as = ImmutableUnimodalBetaDistribution.class)
323        public static interface UnimodalBetaDistribution extends SimpleDistribution {
324
325                /**
326                 * The dispersion parameter of the distribution, which controls how
327                 * tightly the distribution is concentrated around the mean.
328                 *
329                 * It is a number between 0 and 1 where 1 is the most dispersed that can
330                 * be achieved for a given mean, extreme means (close to 0 or 1) will have
331                 * lower maximum standard deviation.
332                 *
333                 * @return the dispersion parameter
334                 */
335                double getDispersion();
336
337                @Override @Value.Default @JsonIgnore
338                default LinkFunction getLink() { return LinkFunction.LOGIT; }
339
340                /**
341                 * The mean of the distribution, which is the expected value.
342                 *
343                 * @return the mean value
344                 */
345                double getMean();
346
347                @Override
348                default double sample(Sampler s) {
349                        return s.beta(this.getMean(), this.getDispersion(), true);
350                }
351        }
352
353        /**
354         * Factory methods for beta distribution
355         *
356         * @param mean the mean of the distribution
357         * @param sd   the standard deviation of the distribution
358         * @return a BetaDistribution instance with the specified mean and standard
359         *         deviation
360         */
361        public static BetaDistribution beta(Double mean, Double sd) {
362                return ImmutableBetaDistribution.builder().setMean(mean).setSd(sd)
363                                .build();
364        }
365
366        /**
367         * Factory methods for binomial distribution
368         *
369         * @param mean the mean of the distribution
370         * @param sd   the standard deviation of the distribution
371         * @return a BinomialDistribution instance with the specified mean and
372         *         standard deviation
373         */
374        public static BinomialDistribution binom(double mean, double sd) {
375                return ImmutableBinomialDistribution.builder().setMean(mean).setSd(sd)
376                                .build();
377        }
378
379        /**
380         * Factory methods for binomial distribution
381         *
382         * @param n the number of trials
383         * @param p the probability of success on each trial
384         * @return a BinomialDistribution instance with the specified parameters
385         */
386        public static BinomialDistribution binom(int n, double p) {
387                return ImmutableBinomialDistribution.builder().setMean(n * p)
388                                .setSd(n * p * (1 - p)).build();
389        }
390
391        /**
392         * Factory methods for gamma distribution
393         *
394         * @param mean the mean of the distribution
395         * @param sd   the standard deviation of the distribution
396         * @return a GammaDistribution instance with the specified mean and standard
397         *         deviation
398         */
399        public static GammaDistribution gamma(Double mean, Double sd) {
400                return ImmutableGammaDistribution.builder().setMean(mean).setSd(sd)
401                                .build();
402        }
403
404        /**
405         * Factory methods for log-normal distribution
406         *
407         * @param mean the mean of the distribution
408         * @param sd   the standard deviation of the distribution
409         * @return a LogNormalDistribution instance with the specified mean and
410         *         standard deviation
411         */
412        public static LogNormalDistribution logNorm(Double mean, Double sd) {
413                return ImmutableLogNormalDistribution.builder().setMean(mean).setSd(sd)
414                                .build();
415        }
416
417        /**
418         * Factory methods for negative binomial distribution
419         *
420         * @param mean the mean of the distribution
421         * @param sd   the standard deviation of the distribution
422         * @return a NegBinomialDistribution instance with the specified mean and
423         *         standard deviation
424         */
425        public static NegBinomialDistribution negBinom(double mean, double sd) {
426                return ImmutableNegBinomialDistribution.builder().setMean(mean).setSd(sd)
427                                .build();
428        }
429
430        /**
431         * Factory methods for normal distribution
432         *
433         * @param mean the mean of the distribution
434         * @param sd   the standard deviation of the distribution
435         * @return a NormalDistribution instance with the specified mean and standard
436         *         deviation
437         */
438        public static NormalDistribution norm(Double mean, Double sd) {
439                return ImmutableNormalDistribution.builder().setMean(mean).setSd(sd)
440                                .build();
441        }
442
443        /**
444         * Factory methods for point distribution
445         *
446         * @param mean the value of the distribution
447         * @return a PointDistribution instance with the specified value
448         */
449        public static PointDistribution point(Double mean) {
450                return ImmutablePointDistribution.builder().setMean(mean).build();
451        }
452
453        /**
454         * Factory methods for Poisson distribution
455         *
456         * @param rate the expected value (mean) of the distribution, which is also
457         *             the variance
458         * @return a PoissonDistribution instance with the specified mean
459         */
460        public static PoissonDistribution pois(double rate) {
461                return ImmutablePoissonDistribution.builder().setMean(rate).build();
462        }
463
464        /**
465         * Factory methods for uniform distribution
466         *
467         * @return a UniformDistribution instance with the default parameters (min=0,
468         *         max=1)
469         */
470        public static UniformDistribution uniform() {
471                return ImmutableUniformDistribution.builder().build();
472        }
473
474        /**
475         * Factory methods for uniform distribution with specified upper bound
476         *
477         * @param upper the maximum value of the distribution (min is fixed at 0)
478         * @return a UniformDistribution instance with the specified upper bound
479         */
480        public static UniformDistribution uniform0(Double upper) {
481                return ImmutableUniformDistribution.builder().setMax(upper).build();
482        }
483
484        /**
485         * Factory methods for unimodal beta distribution
486         *
487         * @param mean       the mean of the distribution
488         * @param dispersion the dispersion parameter of the distribution, which
489         *                   controls how tightly the distribution is concentrated
490         *                   around the mean. It is a number between 0 and 1 where 1
491         *                   is the most dispersed that can be achieved for a given
492         *                   mean, extreme means (close to 0 or 1) will have lower
493         *                   maximum standard deviation.
494         * @return a UnimodalBetaDistribution instance with the specified mean and
495         *         dispersion
496         */
497        public static UnimodalBetaDistribution unimodalBeta(
498                        Double mean, Double dispersion
499        ) {
500                return ImmutableUnimodalBetaDistribution.builder().setMean(mean)
501                                .setDispersion(dispersion).build();
502        }
503
504        @Override @Value.Default @JsonIgnore
505        default double getMaxSupport() { return this.getLink().getMaxSupport(); }
506
507        @Override @Value.Default @JsonIgnore
508        default double getMinSupport() { return this.getLink().getMinSupport(); }
509
510}
